knimeNode.name: Create Well Position
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node should be able to create a new string column with the well position, given two input columns with the plate row (numeric or alphabetic) and plate column (numeric) information. There should be an option whether to keep (default) or remove the two input columns.

intro.p: This node needs to have two Columns with the specific columns with the plate row (numeric or alphabetic) and plate column (numeric) information.The node will create a new string column with the well position in the format you can see in the table below.
This node supports well plates up to 1536 wells.

fullDescription.option: The string, double or integer column containing the column position on the well.
The string, double or integer column containing the column position on the well.
Choose this if you want to dismiss the source columns
Choose this for better sorting options, formate like A01, B02, C03

ports.inPort: Input port with the table to be converted.
ports.outPort: Output port with the new colum WellPosition
